languages.text: [Подмигнуть Соломону и вытащить из уха комм-бусину] "Мне подарили жемчужину, которая шепчет сокровенные тайны, вот так чудо! Мне сказали, что это артефакт с Идекса".
[Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."
languages.original_text: [Подмигнуть Соломону и вытащить из уха комм-бусину] "Мне подарили жемчужину, которая шепчет сокровенные тайны, вот так чудо! Мне сказали, что это артефакт с Идекса".

traits.locale_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artifact from Idex."
[Pull Micro-bead out of your ear] "I was presented with a pearl that whispers innermost secrets, what a marvel!"
[Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artifact from Idex."

[Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artifact from Idex."

languages.text: [朝索罗蒙眨眨眼睛，取出耳中的通讯珠]“这颗珍珠是你的人送给我的，它能道出无数伟大的秘密与奥秘！这可真是件珍宝！我听说，这是艾德克斯的造物。”
languages.original_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."

traits.locale_text: [朝索罗蒙眨眨眼睛，取出耳中的通讯珠]“这颗珍珠是你的人送给我的，它能道出无数伟大的秘密与奥秘！这可真是件珍宝！我听说，这是艾德克斯的造物。”

languages.text: [Guiñarle el ojo a Solomorne y quitarte la cuenta de comunicación de la oreja] «Me regalaron esta perla que me susurra grandes secretos y misterios al oído. ¡Es una maravilla! Dicen que es un artefacto de Idex».
languages.original_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."

traits.locale_text: [Guiñarle el ojo a Solomorne y quitarte la cuenta de comunicación de la oreja] «Me regalaron esta perla que me susurra grandes secretos y misterios al oído. ¡Es una maravilla! Dicen que es un artefacto de Idex».

languages.text: [Solomorne'a göz kırp ve kulağındaki mikro telsizi çıkar] "Büyük sırlar ve gizemler fısıldayan bu inci bana hediye edildi. Muhteşem! İdex'ten gelme bir esermiş."
languages.original_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne'a göz kırp ve kulağındaki mikro telsizi çıkar] "Büyük sırlar ve gizemler fısıldayan bu inci bana hediye edildi. Muhteşem! İdex'ten gelme bir esermiş."

languages.text: [ソロモーンにウインクして、耳から通信機を取り出す]「偉大な秘密や謎について囁くこの真珠をプレゼントされた。なんて素晴らしいんだ！イデックスの遺物だったっけ」
languages.original_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."

traits.locale_text: [耳から通信機を取り出す]「偉大な秘密や謎について囁くこの真珠をプレゼントされた。なんて素晴らしいんだ！」

languages.text: [Adresser un clin d'œil à Solomorne et retirer le communicateur de votre oreille] « Cette perle que vous voyez me murmure secrets et mystères. C'est une petite merveille ! Il paraît que c'est une relique d'Idex ! »
languages.original_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."

traits.locale_text: [Adresser un clin d'œil à Solomorne et retirer le communicateur de votre oreille] « Cette perle que vous voyez me murmure secrets et mystères. C'est une petite merveille ! Il paraît que c'est une relique d'Idex ! »

languages.text: [Solomorne zuzwinkern und den Voxstecker aus deinem Ohr nehmen] "Mir wurde diese Perle geschenkt, die mir große Geheimnisse und Mysterien zuflüstert. Welch ein Wunder! Mir wurde gesagt, sie sei ein Artefakt von Idex."
languages.original_text: [Wink at Solomorne and take the comm-bead from your ear] "I was presented with this pearl that whispers great secrets and mysteries. What a marvel! I was told it is an artefact from Idex."

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne zuzwinkern und den Voxstecker aus deinem Ohr nehmen] "Mir wurde diese Perle geschenkt, die mir große Geheimnisse und Mysterien zuflüstert. Welch ein Wunder! Mir wurde gesagt, sie sei ein Artefakt von Idex."
